nodes.text: LD-402 was a protocol droid used by the Sith Empire during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY it was stationed on the Harrower-class dreadnought Ziost Shadow.
LD-402 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Karagga's Palace" operation and begins one-time opening and closing cutscenes for the Imperial faction.
